name: quickquiz
description: Quiz game built using ReactJS and SCSS, featuring questions from the Open Trivia Database (opentdb.com) API. Test your knowledge and enjoy an engaging, interactive experience!

name: xolcy template
description: Xolcy is a basic web project made with HTML, SCSS, and JavaScript. It's simple and easy to use, great for learning or building your own websites.

name: socialated template
description: Socialated is a straightforward web project created with HTML, SCSS, JavaScript, and jQuery. It's designed to be easy to use and perfect for showcasing basic web development skills.

name: state search
description: Project built with ReactJS and SCSS, utilizing data from the REST Countries API. It's designed to help users easily search and explore information about different countrie

name: truelead template
description: Website template for web development agencies. Built with HTML, SCSS, JavaScript, and jQuery, it's perfect for showcasing your services and portfolio with style.

name: DjangoCRM
description: A clean CRM app with CRUD operations and authentication, powered by Django and TailwindCSS.
